snippet: ZELLERMAIER--Irwin, 90, formerly of New York, died February 27, 2016 in Tucson, AZ. Survived by daughters Nancy O'Neill (Harold) and Margery Lapp (Marshall); granddaughters Carly Davis and Lindsay O'Neill. Services to be held 1pm Thursday, March 3, 2016 at Evergreen Mortuary in Tucson, AZ. 1/3
lead_paragraph: ZELLERMAIER--Irwin, 90, formerly of New York, died February 27, 2016 in Tucson, AZ.
